features: What It Does: This rich, natural shave butter for men gives you the closest shave possible while keeping your face hydrated to prevent nicks, cuts, and irritation. This an unscented product.
Who It’s For: Men of any age with any type of skin – especially those prone to shave irritation.

How It Works: Our premium, non-lathering mens shave butter softens your whiskers and gently lifts them. This allows for an ultra-close shave. An advanced blend of natural ingredients builds a protective cushion between your face and razor, allowing for a shave free of nicks, cuts, and irritation.
Key Ingredients: Natural & Certified Organic ingredients, including aloe vera, coconut oil, glycerin, shea butter, and vitamin E. 99% natural, 72% organic.

Who We Are: Brickell creates skincare and grooming products for men using natural & certified organic ingredients. Our products are sold in over 20 countries and have appeared in GQ, Men's Health, Men's Journal, and other popular men’s magazines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only complaint I have is that the jar is so small! It smells great, works fantastically, and provides a smooth feeling skin after shaving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars seems like different formula - update
reviews.reviewText: Update:Full disclosure: the 5 stars are for customer service. The company reached out immediately and suggested ways to address the issue. Impressive.I used Brickell shave cream for many years. But the latest jar seems very different - the texture and the density are very different. And the problem is that the "slickness", the "glide" is gone. The blade is not gliding anymore, it's scrapping. It's still more or less Ok if you use it with multi-blade razors like Gillette Mach or Fusion, but I'm using double-edged safety razor and getting nicks and cuts when using the current Brickell cream. Have no choice but to switch to another brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and smooth
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Only a little needed to apply for a great shave. It left my skin feeling super smooth. I have really sensitive skin and most shave products cause irritation. This product left no irritation, is the best I’ve found yet, and I’ll continue to use it. The only reason I didn’t give it a 5 star is because it’s a bit pricy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product that’s easy on sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Brickell’s shave butter is great for my sensitive skin. Goes on easily and gives a smooth shave when used with a good razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No me funcionó

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought on a whim and LOVED it! Which got me started on their entire line of products
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on a whim and never looked back. It's not too thick, the smell is good but subtle and a little bit goes a long way. Seriously, this little jar last for so long. I think it's been around 6 years since my first jar and you couldn't convince me to switch to another company. I love how their products are organic, natural and backed by science. Some other products have so many harmful chemicals. I've recently bought more of their products for my skin care routine and the only thing I regret is not doing it earlier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Terrible shave cream.
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Thrown away after the second shave. Can't take it anymore. The smell is SO bad, doesn't mix well when you shake it (shook it like crazy, didn't help) and just makes for an overall bad shave. My 2 star is now going down to a one star because I thought I could get through this tiny bottle but.........just no. Put this product out of its misery.Will not be buying again. Spent $12 on this shaving cream and it looks almost like a sample size (not actually the sample size because I got a sample of it before which I mistakenly forgot to use before I bought this). If you shave a lot and like to use a good amount of shaving cream do not buy this, it'll last you maybe 4-5 shaves. As far as the actual product, it felt like I was spreading some clumpy Cetaphil on my face and didn't really help with my shave much. Lastly, the smell (in my own personal opinion) is terrible, it smells like a cheap form of alcohol, almost made me gag honestly. I LOVE all the other Brickell products I have tried so far (which is the only reason it got a second star), especially the face wash and the face cream but this totally misses the mark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Solution, Effect, and Value
reviews.reviewText: One of if not the best smooth brushless shaving creams I’ve ever used. First the scent is masculine but not overbearing nor old like your fathers or grandfathers scented shaving cream. The cream is smooth, scented and not greasy or sticky. It offers a nice moisturizing effect on my skin. You don’t need a lot of product to apply to face, neck, or in my case scalp. The premium brand razors that I use work great in conjunction with the cream and remove hair without any difficulty. Three strokes at most. I shave every other day so I don’t have a great deal of hair to remove as I’m very consistent. The value for the money is top notch as I’ve used other brands that cost and arm and a leg and don’t offer The same results. Furthermore, the bottle lasted well over 6 weeks. Lastly, the tube is easy to use for travel. Highly recommend.

Excellent product with a fixed place in my shave routine. Works best for me with a few days of stubble. Creams in smoothly with a nice scent. Shaves close with one pass. Add a little bit of water to the slick face for a little touch up against the grain. I am left with smooth moist skin afterwards. No razor burn and a happy face.

Acabo de encontrar la crema de afeitar perfecta para mí. Después de lavarme la cara, me aplico como una almendra gordita de esta crema y la extiendo por la cara y el cuello. Dejo pasar un minuto y me afeito con toda comodidad. La cuchilla se desliza suavemente, consigo un apurado perfecto, y la piel sin irritaciones. Me ha convencido totalmente.
Ottimo prodotto, lascia la pelle senza irritazioni
si il titolo della recensione è e strano ma è la pura verità perché la quantità di prodotto è questa.Lo si può usare per 2 voltee francamente per 13 euro mi sembra esagerato
